pages.text: A barge that holds a Mana pool for mana transport, similar to mana pool minecart but for water.

To Input and Output Mana from/to the barge you need to use a $(item)Mana Pump$(0), put the Pump on top of a $(l:docks)$(item)Barge docker$(0)$(/l) (Pumps will I/O independently of the docker mode) and the Barge in front/back of the pump. Tugs $(l:spring)$(item)linked$(0)$(/l) to the barge will auto dock if the conditions apply.
